value:
$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Prince and princess of a ruined
realm...$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What now?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Know that the heavens witnessed
your battle.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|And you are?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|My name is Thórr.$k$pIn the eyes of mortals, I am seen
as the god of war.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|The heavens...a god from legend...$k$pWhat do you want of us, war god?
Our battle was lost. Do you
intend to judge us?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Judge you? No. Whether or not you
prevailed has no meaning to me.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Listen well, mortals. True strength is
not revealed by the outcome of a
struggle.$k$pConsider that we gods have power
that far outstrips yours.$k$pIf a powerful being smites one who
cannot hope to resist... What can we
learn from this outcome? Nothing.$k$pWe have power, but not true strength.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|You two wagered everything on a
dim hope. You sacrificed yourselves,
railing against fate with all your might.$k$pThat is true strength. I respect it.
I value it.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Nice words. They ring hollow.$k$pWould you reward us? Would you
bring us what Hel would not—our
world, restored?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Indeed.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|First the ruler of the dead... Now
you appear before us, promising
much. Toying with us.$k$pI find it strange—the way entities
such as you amuse yourselves.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Strange? There is nothing strange
about my words, prince of ruin.$k$pI serve Alfaðör. Do you know that
name?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfaðör! Truly?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Oh, yes. He who created all...
No desire lies beyond his
powers.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|All by myself...waiting. How boring.
*yawn* I'm getting sleepy...$k$pTo sleep is to dream... Perhaps, for
Prince Alfonse, this will seem to be
a dream. He might not believe me!$k$pIf one can make anything possible, is
there any difference between dreams
and reality? I suppose not...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Loki!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, my. It's to be this Alfonse, is it?$k$pHe is no friend to me, so I suppose
we have no choice but to go through
the motions...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Have you had your fill of scolding me
yet? If so, I'll be on my way.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait, you!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|There's nothing to get so riled up
about, Prince. I am no enemy of
yours.$k$p$EFace_Cool|The dökkálfar, who bring nightmares...
Perched in one of the nine realms...
You should be worrying about them.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Once your eyes are opened, come
and see me once again, all right?
Hee-hee...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Thórr! Haven't you wrapped things
up yet?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Prince Alfonse. Princess Veronica.
Forge a contract with us.$k$pWe will honor you—as warriors. You
will stand shoulder to shoulder with
us in the heavens.$k$pDo this and in the name of my master
your wish will be granted. Your
people will once again live happily.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Can it be? Really and truly...is this...$k$pWe gave everything we had for this,
and yet...we never came close...$k$pThis time...is it real?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Thórr.$k$pYou said you valued how we fight...$k$pBut you watched us fail, and now
reward us for that failure. Is that
not blasphemy?$k$pWhat was the purpose of all that
suffering? What we... What we did...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, my. I can see how it pains you, my
prince.$k$pBut as you suffered in that ruined
land, as you drowned in blackest
sorrow—$k$pDo you not recall how you wished
to bring everyone back?$k$pHow you vowed that you would do
whatever was required to make that
wish real?$k$pNo matter the gods or devils you
might make deals with! Isn't that
so, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Yes. I could never forget it. It is as
you say. Countless times...I wished
to find a way. Any way.$k$pThórr, you have my word. I will bind
myself to your contract. I will fight
for you.$k$pBut remember this: I do not intend
to bind myself to you for all eternity.
I will free myself from you.$k$pI will serve as proof that the
arrogance of the gods has its
bounds.$k$pI vow this not just for my own
sake, but for another's...$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|You are an exemplar, Prince.
Here and now, we bear witness to
the true strength of a warrior's spirit.$k$pThe nine worlds are a dominion
fit for a general such as you.$k$pStep forward. We will watch it
together...their next battle.$k$p$Sbs150|
